name: Spinach Balls
recipeIngredient: 1 (10 oz) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
2 cups finely crushed herb-seasoned dry bread stuffing mix

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine spinach, stuffing mix, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, black pepper, Italian seasoning, melted butter, eggs, and onions. Shape into walnut-sized balls and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until lightly browned.
